channel.title: Comments on: OpenCon comes to Berlin!

item.description: […] about how amazing OpenCon is before, for PeerJ, and personally for 2014 and 2015. I’ve also led a satellite event in Berlin, and am planning on leading another satellite this year too that will be even bigger and […]
